Description_lang: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance erupt your target's anima, dealing up to $322015s1 Shadow damage to all enemies within $322015a1 yards of the target.If you consume this potion while your weapon is augmented with Shadowcore Oil, the additional damage and range is increased by $s2%. Lasts $d.
AuraDescription_lang: Your spells and abilities have a chance to deal extra Shadow damage to enemies around your target.
